verses.name: Psalms 61:1
verses.text: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.

verses.name: Psalms 61:2
verses.text: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

verses.name: Psalms 61:3
verses.text: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.

verses.name: Psalms 61:4
verses.text: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 61:5
verses.text: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.

verses.name: Psalms 61:6
verses.text: Thou wilt prolong the king’s life: and his years as many generations.
